project_goal: A robust Educational Management System with clear role separations and data isolation between schools and workstreams.

key_features.name: Authentication & RBAC
key_features.description: JWT-based authentication with role-specific login endpoints. Role-based access control implemented at service and permission layers.

key_features.name: Multi-Tenancy
key_features.description: Data isolation between Workstreams and Schools. Users are assigned to specific entities and can only access/manage data within their scope.

key_features.name: User Management
key_features.description: Admin and managers can create, update, and deactivate users according to an allowed management map.

key_features.name: Student & Enrollment
key_features.description: Manage student records and their enrollment in schools and courses.

key_features.name: Academic Statistics
key_features.description: Role-based dashboards showing counts and status of students, teachers, etc.

test_instructions: Focus on testing RBAC boundaries. Ensure that a School Manager cannot create a Workstream Manager, and that users cannot access data outside their assigned School/Workstream.
